entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , St. Stephen
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:47 PM ADT Monday 13 March 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: 2.0°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: St. Stephen 8:00 PM ADT Monday 13 March 2023
Temperature: 2.0°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.8 kPa falling
Humidity: 79 %
Dewpoint: -1.3°C
Wind: ESE 5 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Monday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 4.

entry.title: Tuesday: Snow. High plus 2.
